lead_paragraph: A Manhattan judge granted the request for a competency exam after the lawyer for Thomas S. Gilbert Jr. said his client believed he was being poisoned by a battery.

headline.print_headline: New Psychological Test for Man  Accused of Killing Father in 2015
headline.main: New Psychological Test for Man Accused of Killing Father

snippet: A Manhattan judge granted the request for a competency exam after the lawyer for Thomas S. Gilbert Jr. said his client believed he was being poisoned by a battery.
abstract: Judge Melissa Jackson, in proceeding in Manhattan courtroom, grants new psychological test for Thomas S Gilbert Jr, accused of fatally shooting his father, hedge fund founder Thomas Gilbert Sr, in 2015.
